ideas.name: VoiceFlow CRM
ideas.description: AI-powered CRM that operates entirely through voice commands for field workers, sales reps, and drivers. Updates deals, logs calls, and retrieves customer data hands-free while driving or working.
ideas.revenue_model: Monthly subscription ($29-99/user) + premium voice AI features

ideas.name: LegalDoc AI
ideas.description: Vertical AI for law firms that automatically analyzes contracts, extracts key clauses, identifies risks, and generates summaries. Trained on legal precedents and case law.

ideas.name: DataMoat Marketplace
ideas.description: Platform where companies sell clean, versioned datasets via API for AI training. Includes industry benchmarks, consumer behavior data, and niche market signals.
ideas.revenue_model: 20% commission on data sales + API usage fees

ideas.name: AI Budget Tracker
ideas.description: Monitors all AI tool spending across organization, tracks token usage, identifies waste, and suggests cheaper alternatives. Unified dashboard for ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, etc.
ideas.revenue_model: $99-499/month based on company size + cost savings percentage

ideas.name: SportsVision Coach
ideas.description: AI video analysis for amateur athletes. Upload practice videos, get real-time technique feedback for basketball shots, golf swings, tennis serves with biomechanics overlay.

ideas.name: HealthScore AI
ideas.description: Predictive patient risk scoring for hospitals. Analyzes vitals, history, and symptoms to flag high-risk patients before emergencies occur.

ideas.name: LogisticsRoute AI
ideas.description: Real-time delivery route optimization using traffic, weather, and package priority. Reduces fuel costs by 20-30% for delivery companies.
ideas.revenue_model: Per-vehicle monthly fee ($49-149) + fuel savings share

ideas.name: AI Meeting Scheduler
ideas.description: Autonomous scheduling agent that negotiates meeting times via email/Slack, handles rescheduling, sends reminders, and manages calendar conflicts across teams.

ideas.name: CodeReview Bot
ideas.description: AI that reviews pull requests, suggests improvements, catches security vulnerabilities, and enforces coding standards before human review.
ideas.revenue_model: $99-999/month based on team size + per-repo pricing

ideas.name: CustomerChurn Predictor
ideas.description: SaaS that analyzes user behavior to predict which customers will cancel. Triggers automated retention campaigns before they leave.
